name: frequency-counter
description: Crawl a website, count the words and order them by frequency.
author: Jan Aagaard <jan@aagaard.net>

scripts.build: yarn install --frozen-lockfile && rimraf wwwroot && copyfiles --up 1 "src/*.{html,png}" wwwroot && webpack --mode production
scripts.start: yarn install --frozen-lockfile && rimraf wwwroot && copyfiles --up 1 "src/*.{html,png}" wwwroot && webpack-dev-server
scripts.update-packages: yarn upgrade && npx syncyarnlock -k -s && yarn install
